title: Compare Pyramids and Temple of Hatshepsut-function

content.question: The mortuary temple of Hatshepsut differs from the Great Pyramids at Giza in that the temple did not function as a

choices.label: symbol of political and religious power

topic.text: 2.3: Purpose and Audience in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain how two or more works of art are similar and/or different in how they convey meaning.
